name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Covert Operations Essentials
name_original: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Covert Operations Essentials
description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Covert Operations Essentials is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Red Storm and Zombie Studios. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Red Storm Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Covert Operations Essentials on PC.
